import React from 'react' import Pro from '../Pro' import Soup from './soup.png' export default function Products(props) { const { onAdd, product } = props const data = [ { id: '1', image: {Soup}, name: 'Курочка BARBEQUE', time: '15 минут', rate: 4.8, price: 230, smallImg: 'https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/i?id=39aa110b1a018f6b45381716ab892efffd0ded84-5235444-images-thumbs&n=13' }, { id: '2', image: "https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/i?id=416f71aa75520f929587b79b4333d552c6b62eda-4841475-images-thumbs&n=13", name: 'Рождественский сюрпризво фритюре', time: '10 минут', rate: 5, price: 777, smallImg: 'https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/i?id=39aa110b1a018f6b45381716ab892efffd0ded84-5235444-images-thumbs&n=13' }, { id: '3', image: "https://i.imgur.com/QT78Hua.jpg", name: 'Курочка BARBEQUE', time: '30 минут', rate: 1.2, price: 500, smallImg: 'https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/i?id=39aa110b1a018f6b45381716ab892efffd0ded84-5235444-images-thumbs&n=13' }, ] return (

Салаты

Показать все

{ data.map((item, idx) => (

Смотреть рецепт

arrow_forward

{item.name}

Цена: {item.price}

access_time{item.time}

star star star star star {item.rate}
)) }
) }
